title: EU Debt Analysis: Testing Google Discover Integration
summary: This is a live test to verify the XML News Sitemap and the High-Res Image integration for Google Discover.
body:
Integration Test

This article serves as a technical verification for the Google News Sitemap. If you are reading this, the 48-hour filter is working correctly.

We serve this page with max-image-preview: large meta tags to ensure high CTR on mobile devices.
